meanings.definition: A tiny wafer of semiconducting material used to make an integrated circuit.
meanings.sent1: The microchip in my phone stores all my contacts.
meanings.sent2: The technician carefully inserted the microchip into the computer.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally swallowed a microchip, now I think I have a silicon stomach!
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a microchip, processing information at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The microchip hummed softly, holding the key to unlocking the mystery.

meanings.definition: A small piece of silicon containing a complex network of electronic components.
meanings.sent1: The microchip in the robot controlled its movements.
meanings.sent2: The microchip embedded in the security card allowed access to the building.
meanings.sent3: I found a microchip in my cereal box - maybe it's a secret spy message!
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a fragile microchip, delicate and easily broken.
meanings.sent5: The microchip gleamed under the light, a marvel of modern technology.
